website_summaries.verdict: A whole-package solution for adding the necessary equipment you need for satellite TV in the RV.
pros: Comes with both standard and high definition Dish programming
The dual TV antenna and satellite receiver gives you more options in terms of television programming
Pay-as-you-go payment plan helps to save money off the road
cons: Exclusive satellite service is limited to Dish

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: We have had this satellite antenna for about 6 weeks. We have to unplug and reset every time we watch tv. Constantly loses satellites. Always missing channels and yes the receivers are set for all our channels. We replaced the coaxial cables (rg6) a few times thinking maybe we had bad cables. If the main receiver isn't turned on we get no power to the second receiver . We are not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S Perry

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - KNOW YOUR SATELLITE ARC BEFORE PURCHASING
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to work for us while tailgating in SC. DISH Network informs us that this satellite can ONLY be used to pick up "Western Arc" satellites...which we definitely do not have in SC, which is apparently in the "Eastern Arc" for satellite reception. BEWARE. Nowhere in the description of this product on the page does it mention the Western and Eastern Arc satellites. We are returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome tech support but works well as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Once you establish a clear, line of sight signal from the satellites, it works well. Seems to need a very clear and totally unobstructed 'view' of satellites; even a single tree branch can interrupt signal. Contacting tech support is somewhat cumbersome via their automated phone prompts. Like that it works fine through our RV's built-in cable system. Would definitely buy again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with this whatever never got it to work properly. Found out after delivery and in my attempt to hook this up, it has a receptical for "two" tvs, which is true, both of those tvs have to be on the "same" channel when on. I found this misleading. If I had known all the issue and problems I would have had with this, I NEVER would have made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tart

customer_reviews.title: Major letdown!
customer_reviews.text: Very disatisfied with this product. It has been trouble from the moment we opened the box. We upgraded from a playmaker to this King version to enable us to watch satellite tv in 2 rooms of our RV, but not once has that happened. We have never been able to acquire signal from the second port. We have spent countless hours on the phone with dish network to figure out the problem only to learn, now that our return window has closed, that there is an issue with the satellite's second port. I would not recommend this product to a friend. Rather, i would recommend purchasing 2 single connect playmakers.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Missy

customer_reviews.title: Almost throwed away see Pic
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for awhile then connections and wiring inside failed. After tearing it apart followed failed wires and removed from control board installed coax directly and walla. Worked in a pinch, hood will never fit again. Removed side connect wiring see the pic. Have to hold the coax while satelitte does it search. Ordered the Winnegard Playmaker and will hold onto this as a Frakestein bacjup
customer_reviews.author: Jody A. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle and works great!
customer_reviews.text: All parts were well packed and labeled. It helped that I had some experience so it was easy to set up the second time. Called Dish when prompted and was helped to add the Wally to my account. The whole process took about 1 hour. Enjoying the TV tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: HD and ease of storage
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old winnegard carryout that needed separate power supply. Absolutely fantastic. Installed in less 10 minutes. Smaller and faster than Carryout. Did not have to change anything in my 2016 Jayco Melbourne. Just hook up satellite with the cable supplied to my cable connection in my outside compartment and job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: This was an upgrade for us
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our old one. This one was an improvement. One of our favorite fishing spots we started having trouble with getting any service with our old one. The new one worked great. No problems what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY FAYE

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, the main output or output 1 works pretty good. The second port is very unreliable. I would say the signal to the second t.v. works around 20 percent of the time. If you are purchasing this to run 2 TV's look elsewhere. I have had the rv satellite Guy come out 3 times, he just says throw it away they are junk.
customer_reviews.author: By mike

customer_reviews.title: Better to have 2 standard Tailgatters then to use this for 2 TV's.
customer_reviews.text: For DISH, it's worthless for trying to use 2 receivers for 2 TV's. The main or #1 port will control where the main TV points. So, the 2nd tv will only get 1 sat thus be very limited for receiving stations. It was a headache trying to get 2 tvs working independently even tho I had a Wally for each TV.. You are better off getting a standard DISH Tailgater for each tv or settle for ONE tv/receiver. I plan to either sell this one, or just get a portable dish and tripod for the second tv. KING and DISH have dropped the ball on the usefulness of this Sat in my view.
customer_reviews.author: EJB59

customer_reviews.title: Got it working easily
customer_reviews.text: There was some confusion about acquiring a signal by Dish from either the Wally or the King Tailgater Pro 4900. It took a few transfers of my call at Dish to get the signal acquired. I had already activated the Wally but thought that is what they wanted to complete the install. It was the antenna signal they wanted to acquire.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: It’s works like it was made by and for a King
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to use, perfect picture. No relation, but like the title says, “ like it was made for a king” Grampma and Grampa King love it. The satellite was shipped promptly as promised to the RV resort we were staying at in Arizona and worked perfectly all the way back to Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Cdk

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Once in a while we have problems finding a signal, but it's usually because we can't find south. Many times we set it unsecured on top of our camper or horse trailer and it has set there all weekend through thunderstorms, high winds, rain and snow without moving an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Manor

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT - MY NEW FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: Replaced Wingard G3+ that just wasn't as responsive and reliable as I was used to with earlier models. I am extremely happy with this one! It was easy to install (Dish), is very responsive, and dependable!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Weighs little
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to move and set up. You can put it just about anywhere its flat and can see the sky. These are lighter than most and the handle doubles as a security feature with a bike cable.
customer_reviews.author: lorenR

customer_reviews.title: Great option for outdoor people
customer_reviews.text: Sets up within 10 minutes. No problems with receiving a signal. I use it for tailgating at football games. Pay as you option is a great feature. As a former truck driver wish I had it then. Great option if you drive for a company that wouldn't allow a permanent dish setup. Probably would work well RVing if you dont like to deal a bulky dish and stand. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with new Wally receiver during initial setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with new Wally receiver during initial setup. A little more work to set up when moving camping, sometimes it doesn't always start from the beginning of the setup. Good signal in normal weather and moderate rain. I just connected my home Wally and it works fine with all my normal home package programming. My travel trailer is a 2009 and the internal satellite cable that was pre-installed from the factory would not work. I ran a separate RG6, or the cable that came with it and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: setup can be a little picky
customer_reviews.text: We have used this 2 times, the setup is picky if you are not in a vacant field. Once you have it where it will acquire a satellite all is good. Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Warranty and big discount--why not?!
customer_reviews.text: (Review is for a refurbished model) Works fine when you have at least partial line-of-sight to the southern sky. We've used it twice while camping. Unfortunately, we were only able to get LOS to 1 satellite (darn trees in a campground!). Still, we were able to watch what we wanted to watch, just not in HD. Works fine and was able to purchase it for about $5 more than what my in-laws paid for a new, single-receiver version. I'm a happy camper--literally!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Super satellite dome dish and receiver
customer_reviews.text: Wow what quality great price good quality great features. Easy set up. Fits king stand perfect. Large dome was surprised looks like a Darth fader troopers helmet. The black version looks like Darth Vader. Got for camper and cabin use in Northern Michigan
customer_reviews.author: Oman

customer_reviews.title: HD tv on the road!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase even though we assumed that a DVR was included. Had to purchase the hard drive separately. The ease of the setup was surprising and the picture quality is amazing! It does take some time to get through the process with DISH to activate the pay as you go when arriving at your campsite. Next trip I will call the day ahead of leaving. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Will never find signal
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Spent $400 on the item and used it 1 times camping. The next camping trip we could not get a signal at all. We have now tried it at home to see if maybe it was our location and having the same problem. It continues to try to locate signal but never finds one. We have done all the diagnostic test and no resolution. Wish we would have never spent the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Satellite signal acquisition was a more lengthy process than I expected. Several re-boots to finally initiate but worked well afterwards Unknown if that is what should be expected with each set up after relocating R V
customer_reviews.author: Preston Everett

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised?
customer_reviews.text: This item advertises that you can watch 2 different TV's on 2 different stations, but my expert installer tells me otherwise! I will update this once I'm out in my rig to verify once and for all.
customer_reviews.author: loveshoppingamazon

customer_reviews.title: Makes it nice because I do not have to call the local ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. I have permanently mounted one to my RV use this one at my house when I go there between trips. Makes it nice because I do not have to call the local cable company and hook up the cable since I can continue to use my Dish Satellite both in my RV and my home as well as receive local channels wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Howard

customer_reviews.title: Bring tv with you in rv
customer_reviews.text: Worked out of the box but did take a few hours to download software do it before your first use, if you are already a dish customer it takes 5 minutes on the phone, plus you can turn off the subscription with a simple p Call
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Last resort.
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for what you get. It is not nearly as simple as stated; still have to point it in the right direction and set it up. Cheaper and just as easy to just get an actual dish, plus it’s a better picture and more channel options.
customer_reviews.author: James Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t know
customer_reviews.text: The tailgater works real well on reception on main tv! BUT, the second jack does not work so well or it’s the Wally or both. It takes a long time for the second line to adjust when you change Chanel’s
customer_reviews.author: John A. French

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two of these and both are defective.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first one and the smart card in the receiver didn't match the receiver so I sent it back for a replacement. The replacement showed up and I guess I just got the placement right because it worked but now the dish won't seek out the satellites, so now I am stuck with a bad unit because it has been to long since I got it to send it back to Amazon. I guess I will try warranty. The King customer service isn't very helpful either.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed with the ease of set up and programming... watching tv within 10 minutes.. I do have a perfectly clear shot of the southern sky at my camp, when I arrive set the tailgater outside and bam, instant tv
customer_reviews.author: mike choate

customer_reviews.title: High quality antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Strong cover has survived several hail storms Smoke cover easy to see internal dish movement.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Scudder

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that you can pay on monthly basis when rv is in use.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on my 37' RV with a quick release frame incase I can't get a southern exposure with nose of rv in camp sites
customer_reviews.author: Floyd D

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay connected.
customer_reviews.text: Its not as good as the satellite we replaced. It wont stay connected. We have to reboot several times a day. I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ulonda Hamill

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the Dish,easy to set up but the annoying thing is the start up time on the second receiver each time the first tv switches channels and it's on a different satellite. It has to reboot
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Bloxson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easily and works great. Even watched football in elk camp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: signal
customer_reviews.text: it was fairly easy to hook up but gets upset from wind and rain, you have to make sure the king has a clear view.
customer_reviews.author: nascardeb

customer_reviews.title: A must for RV'ing!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install, exceptional value. The best value for RV'ing!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up I'm really looking forward to enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: It was very simple to set up only took a few minutes to go through that on-screen prompts the included instructions were actually different than the on-screen prompts probably outdated paper material only been able to use it a couple times but it's very light a little larger than 8 x 8 but I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: came as advertise
customer_reviews.text: works as advertise, Mounted on the roof using mount kit.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment, remember to call
customer_reviews.text: We used it on a 9 week cross country trip. The equipment is great. You have to call dish each time you stop and give them the new zip code
customer_reviews.author: chukar10

customer_reviews.title: Great bundled product for my RV
customer_reviews.text: Wow my DTP4950 came today and was easy to set up with the Wally receiver. Excellent picture quality!
customer_reviews.author: Silverado

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Mexico on it's maiden voyage. Zero problems locking in to 3 birds. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Obermeier

customer_reviews.title: My wife says this is the best thing we have added to our camper
customer_reviews.text: We dry camp so far in the boonies they have to pipe in sunshine, so there is no TV reception off the antenna, My wife says this is the best thing we have added to our camper, she loves it, when its too cold and nasty for her to be out side she doesn't have to worry about having a rental movie any more, she can enjoy the same channels in camp we have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon R.

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this Tailgater for tv viewing in the mountains ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Tailgater for tv viewing in the mountains...DISH support assisted in the setting up of this item...affordable tv watching. We set it on the roof of the RV...not stand or mounting.
customer_reviews.author: MoomooPoppy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Is working perfectly. I'm using it with my RV, and it's nice to have my dish network wherever I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Wyomingcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this one . The clear done makes it lots better to see when and if it’s working right
customer_reviews.author: Rick Galliart

customer_reviews.title: Dish says they don’t support two receivers on one dish ...
customer_reviews.text: Dish says they don’t support two receivers on one dish. This product says you can watch two receivers. I plugged both receivers in and kept having interference between the two. Both would be on. I would change a channel and loose signal on both and have to restart. This is a lot of money for it not to work right
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Alan van winkle

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This bundle was delivered on time and was just as ordered. It works great for watching one show at a time or to record one show at a time. We needed to be able to record a show and watch a different show so had to order a hopper and an LNB. This was do to lack research for what our needs were.
customer_reviews.author: herddog

customer_reviews.title: For the price I would recommend one just to have a spare
customer_reviews.text: Works great for an extra satellite dish his trees and branches are in the way you can set it up on the trees and branches and still get good reception back to your motorhome I love it
customer_reviews.author: george a.

customer_reviews.title: If you want two independent TV/Receivers buy two dish's.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with one (1) TV/receiver. If you want two independent TV's and want to be happy and not spend all your time trying to make it work buy two of something but do NOT think this is the thing. Just when you think it is ok - BAM, does not work again, spend more time trying to acquire signal.......
customer_reviews.author: JustHavinFun

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy King Tailgater
customer_reviews.text: After using for one month, I removed it from my rv roof. The unit was filled with water. I took the dome off to remove the water. The company would not honor the guarantee because I took the dome off. I guess they wanted me to ship it back, with the water.
customer_reviews.author: larry Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Could not be used or activated.
customer_reviews.text: The unit came with an activated card that has an outstanding balance through a Dish account. Dish states it can not fix the problem because of the outstanding balance renduring the unit useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was well packaged, worked right away. It was a replacement so we already had an account with dish.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Morris

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER CORD!
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy. Opened receiver box to install and there was no power cord for the Dish Wally. Will change rating when this gets taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy set up, but still hate the price.
customer_reviews.author: I Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% happy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, however Dish programming is not what I expected. Cannot get Fox sports Southwest and one reason I bought the satellite dish
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: TV on the go
customer_reviews.text: Good service. Tested unit in backyard. Took longer than I thought to setup, but is working fine. Time to mount on my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok system when it’s working properly
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone had the issue of resetting the device multiple times a day? I’ve had this system for less than a week and I’ve been on the phone with dish network every day trying to trouble shoot. They cannot solve the issues. I’m very disappointed. Considering sending the whole unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: For outdoor camping with my fifth wheel and it was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: For outdoor camping with my fifth wheel and it was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I just change to Dish and put this on my Rv Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D.

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Work construction & this gets me tv, no matter where they send me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I can use it anywhere I need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Long

customer_reviews.title: just what we needed for our rv
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our rv. easy to set up and works really well
customer_reviews.author: Alice J Muhr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is easy to move and unhook when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Internet sucks.
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell you that you have to buy a Netgear WiFi usb adapter to get internet. Another $40. It's a joke. You have to get a new internet provider to get ant Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: pdhulteng

customer_reviews.title: We haven't tried this out yet as we bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tried this out yet as we bought it for our camper but does seem to have everything we need to watch our shows when we are in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for RVers!
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with the Tailgater. Works well out in the boondocks while RVing! Shipped very quickly, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Easy activation
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install. There was a little confusion to activate the system. There were 2 different numbers in the box. But got it turned on right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It definitely needs a clear line of sight or it won't find the satellites.
customer_reviews.author: Noel A Guthmiller

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't work well with 2 TV's
customer_reviews.text: Works on the main receiver. But the 2nd receiver will hardly work if you want to watch 2 tv at same time this is not for you
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: This dish was so very easy to install. Within a few minute we were watching DISH NETWORK a the State Park.
customer_reviews.author: Tolosatexas

customer_reviews.title: Second receiver doesn't work like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled that it will work with a second receiver. The second can only use the channels that the main receiver is connected to. It does not make for a happy marriage when you change the channel and the wife looses the channel she was watching.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Maphet

customer_reviews.title: Dish tailgater 4 BKLUVE00554L HWID B2340E1L1800554
customer_reviews.text: Still cannot get it to work! 5/5/2019:. Still won't work ☹️
customer_reviews.author: vincent d. odenbrett

customer_reviews.title: Great! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly and the set-up was quick. The directions were simple and easy to follow. We are using the Dish Tailgater while traveling and we love it so far. It picks up the channels great and I love that it's prepaid pay as you go service.
customer_reviews.author: DanyellDavis14

customer_reviews.title: Biggest POS i have ever wasted $ on dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: For the price of satellite it should work flawlessly it doesn't ever get more than 31% signal on clear day and very seldom can you get HD channels if its partly cloudy forget it and a sprinkle of rain all signal lost
customer_reviews.author: william eskew

customer_reviews.title: sent back to tailgater got back said was fixed. ...
customer_reviews.text: sent back to tailgater got back said was fixed. waiting for a clear day says it has to be clear to work. what a joke. will try again on clear day. this is oregon may be a while. who wants something that will only work on sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: ned

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After 12 years on the road and depending on campground cable, we finally made the switch. Love it!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Worley

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Works in rain, snow, and hot sun. If only DISH had their stuff together.
customer_reviews.author: MajorOz

customer_reviews.title: Dish Tailgater Pro
customer_reviews.text: Like being able to see the dish moving into position
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Seay

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This equipment is garbage. Did not work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Okeefe

customer_reviews.title: Not rotating
customer_reviews.text: Having hard time finding channels then realized that the satellite is not rotating
customer_reviews.author: Felkatz

customer_reviews.title: But works good tracking and set up
customer_reviews.text: One coax port is powered to search for satellite set up. Two rooms can not do. But works good tracking and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have right receiver this is a very simple installation. Just attach it to receiver. No sweat. Great picture. We just place it on the ground when our Traveler can't get to satalite
customer_reviews.author: Terry Esslinger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is easier to set up than we could have imagined; power transfers through the signal cable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heppe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. Appears to be good quality. Haven't used it yet as our next RV trip starts next week.
customer_reviews.author: Kip McNinch

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for something to go with our current dish network boxes we have at the house. This was perfect and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: East Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get signal in. Wouldn't pick up all the satellite's up. Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert LeDuc

customer_reviews.title: I dont like it
customer_reviews.text: I use it for dish TV. It will not stay on the channel when you shut TV off . Sometimes you have to download channels over when you turn it back on .
customer_reviews.author: Oleo

customer_reviews.title: It works awsome
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Sis and Brother in law .They are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Grama B

customer_reviews.title: Fast set up & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Finds satellite fast and it is much quieter and somewhat smaller than the VueCube that I let go with an RV I sold.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Failed
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 months to get an appointment to have RV service department install. When installed, it did not work. Since it was past the return deadline, I am stuck with a worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiote

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I could never get this to work for me. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly easy to set up. We used it at every game last year. Easy setup and take down. I would recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We are full time RV living and do not always have reliable Wifi. This saved us from boredom! We can have tv where ever we go.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I was in a location that had great signal I will be using it again soon in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried it once. I was in a location that had great signal I will be using it again soon in a remote area. Hope it works. Installation was simple!
customer_reviews.author: pmlamiller

customer_reviews.title: Great product &really easy to set up & use
customer_reviews.text: Great product &really easy to set up & use. Does a great job. I wish I would have found this year's ago.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley dinges

customer_reviews.title: Good antenna system
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first time. A lot easier to use than my manual aiming antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Freaking love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love this thing! Game changer for tailgating. Load it up, set it on top of our vehicle after we park and plug it into my dish receiver. Follow a few steps and then we're up and running in less than 15 minutes. Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: First one, didn't work had to return. Second one works like a charm. Use it on our RV, a very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ballard

product_meta.title: KING VQ4550 Tailgater Bundle - Portable Satellite TV Antenna and DISH Wally HD Receiver
product_meta.description: Style:Dual Output with Receiver| Color:GrayEnjoy live dish HD TV wherever the fun takes you with the KING Tailgater portable satellite TV antenna and dish Wally HD satellite receiver. Designed for sporting and outdoor enthusiasts, the Tailgater for dish is ideal for watching the big game in parking lots, campsites and more. The included Wally HD receiver includes a Wi-Fi USB Adapter that allows you to connect to a wireless network to enjoy streaming videos and other Web Apps. The automatic-aiming antenna is easy to set up and works right out of the box. Payment is simple, too. With no contracts and no extra fees, the pay-as-you-go plan From dish only bills you for the months you use. When the season ends, simply cancel the satellite service at any time without penalty. Already have dish at home? Just add the new receiver to your account for one Bill. You'll never have to be without TV again. Call dish to see if local channels are available in your area.
feature_bullets: Portable satellite TV antenna for dish service with included Wally HD receiver. Sign up for Pay-As-You-Go or add to your home dish service
Use as either portable antenna or roof mounted (mounting feet included)
The Wally HD receiver has Wi-Fi capability (USB Wi-Fi adapter sold separately) that allows you to connect to a wireless network to enjoy streaming videos and other web apps
Supports multiple TV viewing with the built-in dual coaxial outputs (programming must be on the same satellite); fully automatic satellite acquisition of Western Arc Satellites 110/119/129
Powered through receiver with no separate remote or power source
Can be used as pay-as-you-go or added to home DISH service

specifications.Cover Included: KING Tailgater Antenna, 50' Coaxial Cable, Owner's Manual, Quick Reference Guide, DISH Wally HD Receiver, 7' HDMI Cable, Remote Control
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars460 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
